entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Milk River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.9°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
